articles.author: Megan Myers
articles.title: ‘Drives me absolutely insane’: Sticker shock at the pump as gas prices up over 50% since Biden took office - Fox Business
articles.description: Americans filling their tanks up at a gas station in Alexandria, Virginia, reacted to gas prices rising over 50% since January 2021 when President Biden took office.
articles.content:
Rising gas prices under President Biden's watch have led some Americans to face "painful" and "ridiculous" receipts at the pump, drivers at a Virginia gas station told Fox News.
"There's no saving,"… [+3955 chars]
